Package com.project

Class Officer

java.lang.Object
com.project.User
com.project.Applicant
com.project.Officer
public class Officer extends Applicant
Represents an Officer in the system, who is both an Applicant and capable of performing additional officer-level operations such as project registration, responding to inquiries, and flat booking. Officers can register for projects and are evaluated for eligibility. They are managed through OfficerRegistrationManager, OfficerProjectManager, BookingManager, and InquiryResponseManager.

Officers have a registration status and can undertake projects. They are also applicants and thus inherit applicant-related functionalities.

See Also:

  • OfficerOperations
